item.title: Rep. Burchett to Newsmax: Congress Must Turn Trump Orders Into Law in '26
item.description: Rep. Tim Burchett, R-Tenn., said on Newsmax on Thursday that Republicans must enter the new year focused on advancing President Donald Trump's agenda.
